bug.author: aaronmarkham
bug.summary: website redirect loop on error pages
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
The 404 error page is triggered when going to a missing page, but there's a redirect loop. <denchmark-link:https://mxnet.incubator.apache.org/error/404.html>https://mxnet.incubator.apache.org/error/404.html</denchmark-link>
